patterns: What is the location of your office?
Can you please tell me your office location?
responses: We are located in Dha Phase 2 Ext, 12th Commercial, Plot 63-C, near Meezan Bank.
We are open 9am-6pm Monday-Friday and 9am-3am on Saturday!

patterns: What type of work you do
responses: We, Heights Communication is a BTL agency based in Pakistan and UAE. We do indoor and outdoor advertising campaigns, marketing campaigns and branding campaign for our clients. For more information about our work, you can call us at +923232779999

patterns: What is the expereience of your company?
How long your company is operating
responses: Since 2007, We are providing clients with advertising and marketing solutions.
We are providing advertising and marketing solutions to our clients since 2007.

patterns: What services you offer to clients?
responses: We provide variety of services including corporate launch, activities, outdoor promotions, digital branding, product display, digital printing, hoarding advertising and much more. For more information call us at +923232779999

patterns: Can you give me a quotaion?
responses: For rates and pricing of a particular service, call us now at +923232779999 and get the quotaion right away.
To see our recent project, please click on  ' our projects' tab. For more information about our past projects call us at +923232779999

patterns: For which brands you work for
